products.name: Wireless Headphones
products.description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation, 40-hour battery life, comfortable over-ear design, Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, and built-in microphone for hands-free calls.

products.name: Smart Watch
products.description: Feature-rich smartwatch with health monitoring, heart rate and sleep tracking, GPS, water resistance, customizable watch faces, and notifications for calls and messages.

products.name: Bluetooth Speaker
products.description: Portable speaker with 20-hour battery life, deep bass, waterproof design (IPX7), Bluetooth 5.0, built-in microphone, and compact size for easy travel.

products.name: Laptop Backpack
products.description: Durable backpack with USB charging port, padded laptop compartment (fits up to 15.6"), water-resistant material, multiple pockets, and ergonomic shoulder straps.

products.name: Wireless Mouse
products.description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with silent clicks, adjustable DPI settings, long battery life, USB receiver, and comfortable grip for extended use.

products.name: USB-C Hub
products.description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with 4K HDMI, 3 USB 3.0 ports, SD/TF card reader, PD charging, and aluminum body for laptops and tablets.

products.name: Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with blue switches, customizable lighting effects, anti-ghosting keys, detachable wrist rest, and durable metal frame.

products.name: Portable SSD
products.description: 1TB portable SSD with USB 3.1 support, ultra-fast data transfer speeds, shock-resistant design, compact and lightweight for easy portability.

products.name: Webcam
products.description: 1080p HD webcam with built-in microphone, auto light correction, plug-and-play USB, wide-angle lens, and privacy cover for secure video calls.

products.name: Wireless Charger
products.description: Fast wireless charger compatible with all Qi devices, 10W output, slim design, LED indicator, and overcharge protection for safe charging.

products.name: Fitness Tracker
products.description: Waterproof fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, step counter, sleep analysis, multi-sport modes, and smartphone notifications.

products.name: Tablet Stand
products.description: Adjustable aluminum tablet stand for desk, compatible with most tablets and phones, foldable design, anti-slip base, and cable management.

products.name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
products.description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, touch controls, wireless charging case, sweat resistance, and up to 30 hours playtime.

products.name: Gaming Mouse Pad
products.description: Large RGB gaming mouse pad with non-slip base, customizable lighting modes, smooth surface for precise control, and waterproof coating.

products.name: Smart LED Bulb
products.description: WiFi-enabled smart LED bulb with app control, voice assistant compatibility, adjustable brightness and color, energy efficient, and easy installation.

products.name: Action Camera
products.description: 4K waterproof action camera with accessories, wide-angle lens, image stabilization, WiFi connectivity, and long battery life for outdoor adventures.

products.name: Laptop Cooling Pad
products.description: Ultra-slim laptop cooling pad with LED fans, adjustable height, quiet operation, USB powered, and supports laptops up to 17 inches.

products.name: Portable Projector
products.description: Mini portable projector with HDMI and USB, 1080p support, built-in speakers, compact design, and easy setup for home or outdoor use.

products.name: Smart Plug
products.description: WiFi smart plug with voice control support, energy monitoring, timer function, remote control via app, and easy setup with no hub required.

products.name: External Hard Drive
products.description: 2TB external hard drive USB 3.0, fast data transfer, durable casing, plug-and-play compatibility, and backup software included.
